<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">

        <replaced_by/>
        <script>function setIncType(){
   //Set the 'Incident state' and 'State' values to 'Resolved', and display mandatory fields
   //g_form.setValue('incident_state', 6);
   g_form.setValue('u_incident_type',3);
   g_form.setValue('u_priority_score',100);
   alert('This is a MAJOR incident!  Notifications being sent..');

}

//Code that runs without 'onclick'
//Ensure call to server-side function with no browser errors
if (typeof window == 'undefined')
   serverIncType();

function serverIncType(){
   //current.incident_state = 6;
   g_form.setValue('u_incident_type',3);
   current.update();
}

action.setRedirectURL(current);
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>UI Action</script_type>
        <short_description>To set field from a UI Action (e.g. Calculate Priority Score)</short_description>
